title: PGIMER Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 02 Senior Resident Posts
description: Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research (PGIMER) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill the 02 vacancies for Senior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, MD/ MS can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the walk-in at the address given below. Here is more information about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for t...
